author: raulvk
content:
Sharing https://gloas.ethp2p.dev/ -- visualizes in real time how Fulu blocks would transform into Gloas blocks, analyzing the breakdown per object and per field, including Snappy compression stats (try clicking on a slot)

Next, we plan to add BALs and plot the full slot timeline (a "slot x-ray" basically). Having this, we can extrapolate useful data to inform open questions like deadlines and variable PTC.
